thread.title: Apriva to Exhibit at CAMA 2015 Conference and Tradeshow
thread.title_full: Apriva to Exhibit at CAMA 2015 Conference and Tradeshow - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Apriva to Exhibit at CAMA 2015 Conference and Tradeshow
text:
Apriva to Highlight Vending and Campus Solutions During Show
Scottsdale, Arizona (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Apriva, the leading provider of secure end-to-end wireless transaction and information solutions, today announced that they will be exhibiting at Canadian Automatic Merchandising Association (CAMA) 2015 conference and tradeshow in Niagara Falls, Canada. The event will take place from October 15-17, 2015, at the Scotiabank Convention Center.
CAMA is the only show in Canada that brings together vending, micro market and office coffee service professionals. The show aims to educate and inform attendees on the latest trends and developments in the industry. This widely attended show features major vendors and industry leaders demonstrating products and speaking on timely and relevant issues.
WHO: Apriva participants include: Paul DeRosse, Vice President of Business Development in Canada; James Lawrence, Vice President of Market Solutions; and Geoffry Cook, Key Account Manager. In addition, the event will include industry leaders in the vending, office coffee and food service industries.
WHAT: CAMA Conference and Tradeshow. Participants can register for the event on the CAMA 2015 website: http://www.vending-cama.com/EVENTS/expo2015.asp . Aprivaâ€™s team will be showcasing their vending, campus and integration service solutions in their booth during the show.
WHEN: The CAMA Conference and Tradeshow will be held from Thursday, October 15 through Saturday, October 17, 2015.
WHERE: The event will take place at the Scotiabank Convention Center at 6815 Stanley Avenue in Niagara Falls, Ont. Apriva will be exhibiting in booth 307 in the exhibit hall.
About Apriva
Founded in 2003, Apriva is the leading provider of end-to-end wireless transactions and secure information messaging solutions that meet the exacting security and reliability requirements of financial services providers, government entities, and public service sectors. Through its two operating groups, Apriva Point of Sale (POS) and Apriva Information Security Systems (ISS), the company offers customers fully-managed, end-to-end, security solutions that incorporate hardware, software, network infrastructure and management tools. For more information, visit http://www.apriva.com .
